level.text: 606.1 Licensed premises shall be open during business hours to inspection byuthorized agents of the District government.
606.2 No person shall obstruct or interfere with any District agent when thegent is on official inspection business.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Article 28, ยง2(b) of the Police Regulations (1981) (as section 609);s amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 7303 (September 4, 2009).
